summary: All requirements from the BuildRequest have been successfully implemented. REQ-8 is satisfied: App.tsx now imports and renders SnowfallBackground instead of RainBackground with proper z-index layering. REQ-9 is satisfied: SnowfallBackground.tsx implements a full canvas-based snow animation with all required features including device-pixel-ratio scaling, resize handling, particle density calculation (min 40, max 250), prefers-reduced-motion support, requestAnimationFrame animation, vertical falling with horizontal drift, and soft glow appearance. No hallucinated features were detected.
